Ext.menu.Separator Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.menu.Separator
  • menu
  • menuseparator
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.menu.Separator Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.menu.Menu', {
        width: 100,
        height: 100,
        floating: false, // usually you want this set to True (default)
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(), // usually rendered by it's containing component
        items: [{
            text: 'icon item',
            iconCls: 'add16'
        }, {
            xtype: 'menuseparator'
        }, {
            text: 'separator above'
        }, {
            text: 'regular item'
        }]
    });
});
